name: Andrew Kundrock
text: Good local pizza and the only one available in gunbarrel. Been ordering take out for years and have never been disappointed. Nothing too special, but fits the niche if your hungry and don't want to cook yourself. Nice dining room with …More

name: Tony Apuzzo
text: Basic pizza pie. Fast and easy. I like the cracker crust and there's almost always a coupon available online or on the box for next time. The cracker crust is very good. Wings are pretty good too.

name: whatchama carcass
text: The pizza is generally good and if you've been to other Blackjacks you know what to expect. I've always had good service and the prices are fair for pizza. I prefer ordering from here rather than Abos North (I always get delivery) because …More

name: Todd Hoffman
text: We are a fan of their pizza, we receive prompt delivery, but its their pricing that we are finding hard to swallow.  I'm told this location is under independent ownership and there for can charge what ever prices they want.  Despite the …More

name: Shane Williams
text: This place has been notorious for years for not honoring any coupons, they are strict and wont even tweak a deal i keep getting coupons that they wont honor in the mail, i hate ordering from them, probably last order this place sucks..

name: Cindy Brandle
text: Absolutely horrible food and worse, horrible people. They didn't deliver several of my items and then the food was terrible. I asked for a refund and the manager who worked there on Tuesday, March 14 @ 6:00 was extremely rude. He refused to …More

name: Vannis
text: Have ordered here over 15 times and have been able to swap cheese out for other toppings no problem(lactose intolerant).  Just talked with the 'owner' over the phone for an order and he was extremely unhelpful; who wouldn't swap out the …More

name: Bryon Wheaton
text: Decent Delivery Pizza.  Driver was courteous, food was no different than any number of similar pizza place in the word.  think, doughy crust with toppings on it.

name: kellan garry
text: Good pizza. Good dessert. Fast delivery. 5 stars.

name: Justin Alvey
text: Decent tasting pizza for cheap. Service is severely lacking however

name: Ashay Brahmbhatt
text: The worst food ever. I can't rate this 0 stars, otherwise I would. Terrible customer service too.

name: Ryan Trahan
text: First, this is not a review of there food. I have no idea how good it is, and i won't find out. I wanted to try a new pizza place, i live in Niwot with a few local choices, and the regular chain stuff in longmont. Today, i pulled a coupon …More

name: Genevieve Roberts
text: got takeout- decent pizza at a decent price!

name: Anne Pienciak
text: Same good .Blackjack quality.  But they do not take the standard BlackJack coupons.  For example, today, I asked about a coupon for 1 large 5 topping pizza for 10.99.This Black Jack charges 11.99.  Other times they said they don't take the coupons.

name: Eric Sokol
text: Pizza is okay when they answer the phone. But 50% of the time when we call they don't pick up. Unfortunately, the Abo's closest to us had terrible pizza. For people in the area, frozen pizza is the best option.

name: Travis Durocher
text: I placed an online order for a pizza from the above location. The pizza came to my house cold, dry, and burnt. When I called to speak to a manager I was extremely disrespected! The manager also lied about my story. I have never experienced …More

name: Don Reichelt
text: This location will NOT honor coupons from Blackjack corporate for some reason.    When I questioned why, their manager, Mike, became extremely condescending and rude.   If you're considering getting pizza in the Niwot/Gunbarrel area, do …More

name: Rich Berman
text:
Always have take out GF and we've been very pleased.
Also, delivery staff very polite and timely

name: Luke Woolley
text: Staff is always kind, pizza is always tasty. Prices are great, I go here at least once a week for lunch and get 3 slices for $4 (or you can get buffet + drink for $8).

name: Michael Wadsworth
text: bull i have a coupon for 21.99 for family deal rude as can be. bad customer service.

name: Brown Bear
text: Terrible hours for a pizza delivery company. Not affiliated with the real Blackjack company.

name: Jacqueline Stone
text: Horrible pizza. Nice delivery people though.

name: Itzel Rivera
text: Horrible management .

name: Jo Oj
text: Called 6 times today after 5 PM and did not get an answer. Ordering Abo's now.

name: shadow nat
text: Called 5 times over a half an hour at 7 pm and no one would answer. Terrible service

name: Google Baron
text: Best Blackjack with in 50 miles

name: TIM HANRATTY
text: Will not deliver to lake valley :(
